item.title: The ultimate tour to my python environment
item.author: Email Contact (lxip)
item.description: Like someone else who stepped into coding from other random fields might have experienced, I do find the lack of system level knowledge could significantly hinder the workflow. In a word, how to get a smoothly working environment for all your tools with minimum conflicts and collapse? Recently I encountered some After spending a whole day, Here I mainly talk about Python,
